search.query: index="main" host IN ($selectedHost$) AND source IN ("cpu" "vmstat") AND sourcetype IN ("cpu" "vmstat") | fields *

index="prod_web" host IN ($selectedHost$) sourcetype IN ("access_combined" "access_combined_wcookie") | rex "^(?:[^/\n]*/){3}(?P<application>[^/]+)" | rex ".*config=(?<config>\w+)\&" | eval bytes=if(bytes="-", "0", bytes) | eval proxyGateway=case( in(host, "churn.bcgov", "parch.bcgov"), "Justin", in(host, "stew.bcgov", "seethe.bcgov", "simmer.bcgov"), "Jag" ) | eval zone=case( like(clientip, "-"), "Unknown", cidrmatch("10.0.0.0/8", clientip), "IANA Private Address", cidrmatch("142.22.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.23.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.24.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.25.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.26.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.27.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.28.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.29.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.30.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.31.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.32.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.33.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.34.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.35.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.36.0.0/16", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("142.191.0.0/16", clientip), "Shared Services Canada", cidrmatch("198.154.28.0/22", clientip), "E-Comm 911", cidrmatch("198.162.126.0/24", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("198.162.124.0/23", clientip), "Province of BC", cidrmatch("64.87.128.0/17", clientip), "Shared Services Canada", cidrmatch("199.212.216.0/24", clientip), "Shared Services Canada", cidrmatch("199.212.192.0/20", clientip), "Shared Services Canada", cidrmatch("199.212.208.0/21", clientip), "Shared Services Canada", like(clientip, "%.%.%.%"), "ZI" ) | eval application=if(like(application, "% HTTP"), "other_apps", application) | eval config=case( in(lower(application), "ceis", "coaf", "crc", "cso-2", "cso", "dfweb", "ecrc", "essa", "filingassistant", "jpi", "lra", "opra", "psso"), "JBoss - Justin", in(lower(application), "jrccordsapiwrapper", "autoefile", "carmaws", "ccd", "cdds-3", "cdds", "crrpservice", "cso-autoefile-batch-run", "cso2jpiws", "csoextws", "csojm", "csows", "dfwebws", "docUploader", "essaws", "fams", "iris-2", "iris-4", "iris", "pac", "pacws", "phis", "vipsws", "vista"), "JBoss - Jag", like(config, "%"), config, true(), "other_configs" ) | eval config=if((lower(application)="12cforms2" AND config="other_configs"), "other_oraforms", config) | eval targetProcessor=case( in(lower(config), "justin_prod", "cms_prod", "tosca_prod", "figaro_prod", "justin_police", "ceis_prod", "fis2_prod", "scms_prod", "tabs_prod", "cms_prod_bert", "ceis_prod_bert", "por_prod", "elvis_prod", "dfcms_prod", "cms_prod_stubble", "cms_prod_orkney", "rbcms_prod", "cms_prod_williams", "figaro_prod_williams", "justin_prod_orkney", "css_prod", "oic_prod", "stvcms_prod"), "OracleForms", in(lower(application), "ceis", "coaf", "crc", "cso-2", "cso", "dfweb", "ecrc", "essa", "filingassistant", "jpi", "lra", "opra", "psso"), "JBoss App Cluster Public Facing", in(lower(application), "jrccordsapiwrapper", "autoefile", "carmaws", "ccd", "cdds-3", "cdds", "crrpservice", "cso-autoefile-batch-run", "cso2jpiws", "csoextws", "csojm", "csows", "dfwebws", "docUploader", "essaws", "fams", "iris-2", "iris-4", "iris", "pac", "pacws", "phis", "vipsws", "vista"), "JBoss App Cluster Ministry Facing", true(), "OtherProcessors" ) | eval targetProcessor=if((lower(application)="12cforms2" AND config="other_oraforms"), "OracleForms", targetProcessor) | dedup _time host | fields *

| stats count as realCount by zone proxyGateway application config targetProcessor | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by zone proxyGateway | rename zone as source, proxyGateway as target] | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by proxyGateway application | rename proxyGateway as source, application as target] | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by application config | rename application as source, config as target] | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by config targetProcessor | rename config as source, targetProcessor as target] | table source target count | search source=* | sort -count | head 100

| stats sum(bytes) as realCount by zone proxyGateway application config targetProcessor | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by zone proxyGateway | rename zone as source, proxyGateway as target] | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by proxyGateway application | rename proxyGateway as source, application as target] | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by application config | rename application as source, config as target] | appendpipe [ stats sum(realCount) as count by config targetProcessor | rename config as source, targetProcessor as target] | table source target count | search source=* | sort -count | head 100
| makeresults | eval title="Proxy Server Performance Indicators" | eval colorCode=1 | stats values(colorCode) as colorCode by title | eval range="guarded"
| timechart max(cpu_load_percent) as Load by host | eval Threshold=50
| timechart max(memUsedPct) as Memory max(swapUsedPct) as Swap by host span=30s | eval Thresold=50
| timechart max(pctIowait) as "I/O wait" by host span=30s | eval Threshold=10
| makeresults | eval title="System and Network Correlation" | eval colorCode=1 | stats values(colorCode) as colorCode by title | eval range="guarded"

| eval timeTaken4Request=(other/1000000) | eval config=if((isnull(config) AND (status > 399)),status,config) | timechart span=60s max(timeTaken4Request) as MaxTime by config useother=false usenull=false | rename config as Application | appendcols [ search index="main" host IN ("stew.bcgov", "seethe.bcgov", "simmer.bcgov", "churn.bcgov", "parch.bcgov", "hitch.bcgov", "saute.bcgov", "poach.bcgov", "stirfry.bcgov", "glaze.dmz", "mince.dmz", "pledge.bcgov" "promise.bcgov") AND source IN ("cpu" "vmstat") AND sourcetype IN ("cpu" "vmstat") | eval serverScope=case( (host="stew.bcgov" OR host="seethe.bcgov" OR host="simmer.bcgov"),"Jag Proxy", (host="churn.bcgov" OR host="parch.bcgov"),"Justin Proxy", (host="hitch.bcgov" OR host="saute.bcgov" OR host="poach.bcgov" OR host="stirfry.bcgov"),"JBoss App Cluster Ministry Facing", (host="glaze.dmz" OR host="mince.dmz"),"JBoss App Cluster Public Facing", (host="pledge.bcgov" OR host="promise.bcgov"),"Layer7 SSG", 1=1,NULL()) | timechart span=60s max(cpu_load_percent) as CPU max(memUsedPct) as MEM max(pctIowait) as IO by serverScope ]
| makeresults | eval title="Proxy Performance Indicators" | eval colorCode=0 | stats values(colorCode) as colorCode by title | eval range="guarded"
| top limit=10 referer_domain
| search clientip="142*" | top clientip limit=10
| search clientip!="142.*" AND clientip!="-" | top clientip limit=10
| top useragent limit=10
| stats dc(clientip) as clientIPs by useragent | sort 10 -clientIPs
| stats count(_raw)
| top config limit=10
| stats sum(bytes) as totalBytes by config | sort 10 -totalBytes
| stats sum(bytes) as totalBytes | eval totalGB=round(totalBytes/(1024*1024*1024),2) | table totalGB
| stats count(_raw) by host
| stats sum(bytes) by host
| search method!="-" | stats count by method
| search method!="-" | stats sum(bytes) as bytes by method
| lookup httpStatusCodes.csv status output status_description status_type | stats count by status_description
| search (status!=200 status!=304 status!=404) | lookup httpStatusCodes.csv status output status_description status_type | stats count by status_description
